actions.recommendation: An increased waist circumference can increase your risk of chronic disease. Follow the advice above to try and lose a bit of abdominal weight

Raised homocysteine could indicate insulin resistance and may be a risk for diabetes. To lower your insulin please watch the carbohydrates in your diet. Continue your intermittent fasting, eat a lower carb higher good fat diet, continue exercising, manage your stress and try to lose some abdominal fat.

Raised fasting insulin could indicate insulin resistance and may be a risk for diabetes. To lower your insulin please watch the carbohydrates in your diet. Continue your intermittent fasting, eat a lower carb higher good fat diet, continue exercising, manage your stress and try to lose some abdominal fat.
